title: Khüder
data: Khüder (Mongolian: Хүдэр) is a sum (district) of Selenge Province in northern Mongolia. In 2008, its population was 2,078.[1] 49°46′35″N 107°30′58″E﻿ / ﻿49.77639°N 107.51611°E﻿ / 49.77639; 107.51611 This Mongolia location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
